text.title: Romanian PM Victor Ponta indicted in fraud case
text.head: Romanian PM Victor Ponta indicted in fraud case
Sources

list.item: AFP. "Romanian PM Victor Ponta facing graft trial: prosecutors" — Bangkok Post , September 17, 2015
"Romania PM Victor Ponta to face corruption trial" — BBC News Online , September 17, 2015
Radu-Sorin Marinas and Luiza Ilie. "Romanian PM Ponta faces trial in corruption case" — Reuters , September 17, 2015
"Romanian Prime Minister Ponta indicted for corruption" — Deutsche Welle , September 17, 2015
